page.title: 02Housing In Rufforth 1985
page.content: Altogether in the village of{Rufforth there are{157 dwellings.}Of these{60 are{detached Houses, 20}are{semi- {detached houses.}There are{54 detached {bungalows, 18 semi detached bungalows and{15 terraced houses.}The{newer {houses}are built in small{Avenues, {Closes and Crescents.}The{houses}in each one being designed by the same {architect}have{common features. {Older}houses are built by the{main {road}through the{village.}The{dates of some these are :-{1830, 1843, 1869, {1880.}Some of these have{names}like:- {Ashville Farm, Chapel, Woodlands {Gables, Linden Lea, Amberley, {Rufforth House, Pinfold House, {Fir Tree Cottages, The Neuk, Holbeck, {Lynn Garth, Wellgarth House, Ivy- {Cottages, Croftside, Milestone House. {Bradley House}was built in{1865. {}
